Excellent Plenary #cic2020cci by Dr. S. Halperin @DalhousieU @VACCres - 
The search for a #COVID19 vaccine

“So far, the focus has been on immunological & biological sciences, but we now need to focus on implementation & social sciences” #logistics #vaccine #acceptance #hesitancy https://t.co/3wYMgpPmfR
